name: Learn Ranger Trap
description: You learn how to create one kind of ranger trap.
benefit: Select one ranger trap (see page 20). You may use this trap a number of times per day equal to your Wisdom bonus (minimum 1). The DC for your trap is equal to 10 + 1/2 your characterâ€™s level + your Wisdom bonus, and it lasts 1 day per 2 character levels.
special: A ranger can use ranger traps a number of times per day equal to 1/2 his ranger level + his Wisdom bonus. See the description of ranger traps for durations.
